title: Did the White House Press Secretary Say That WWII Vets Upset About Japan Visit Should ‘Get Over It’?
subtitle: Comments made by Josh Earnest about diplomatic relations with Japan around the 2016 anniversary of Pearl Harbor did not include a directive that veterans should "get over it."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: White House Press Secretary Josh Earnest said World War II veterans who felt "embittered" by diplomatic relations with Japan on the anniversary of Pearl Harbor in 2016 should "get over it."
